channel.title: Need help with rsps client
channel.description: okay so recently i found a really nicesource but the client isnt loading so i found a rsps client that i want to replace with...so how do i run the source so that the client works with it in other words "i want to use a source, with a random client how do i like convert is so they run together" and so it loads up.

item.title: Need help with rsps client
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

For my source, get another PI client and just run it and run the source and your done.

Read full topic
